info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API for managing medical appointments with doctors, nurses, and physiotherapists. All endpoints require JWT authentication.

post.summary: Log in and get a JWT token

password: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Creates a new emergency call for the authenticated user. The patient_id is automatically assigned based on the logged-in user.

call_id.description: The ID of the newly created emergency call

date: The date must be a valid date.

post.description:
Create a new medical record

Creates a new medical record for the authenticated patient with the provided health parameters.
The patient_id is automatically retrieved from the authenticated user.
Creates a new medical appointment booking.

get.summary: Get patient's medications for a specific day
get.description: Returns a list of medications assigned to the logged-in patient for a given date.

date: The date must be a valid date.
The date does not match the format Y-m-d.

post.description: Updates the intake status of a medication for a given ID.

medication_id: The medication id field is required.
The medication id must be an integer.
is_taken: The is taken field must be true or false.

get.description: Returns the total number of medications and how many have been taken for a given date.

date: The date must be a valid date.
The date does not match the format Y-m-d.

get.description:
Get all recommendations

Returns a list of all recommendations available in the system.

Get recommendation details

Returns detailed information about a specific recommendation.

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}
